description: Are computers creating jobs or destroying them? What does our automated future look like? The software-powered world might not be so bad -- you just have to look at the big picture. As technology develops, were not automating individual jobs but entire industries, as we meet more of our needs through massively scalable software. Its a huge shift in the way society works, and it doesnt have to be a bad one.
